params.updateInterval: - Period of time between two counter increments expressed as UNIX timestamp value

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if the contract requires work to be done

constructor.notice: Executes once when a contract is created to initialize state variables

interval().notice: Use an interval in seconds and a timestamp to slow execution of Upkeep

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Performs the work on the contract, if instructed by :checkUpkeep():

userdoc.notice: A keeper-compatible contract that increments counter variable at fixed time intervals
